summary: The diff shows partial implementation of the requirements. REQ-22 (statistics removal from CallToActionSection) is implemented, but REQ-21 (newsletter signup bar removal) is missing. The email signup form that remains in CallToActionSection is the main CTA form (explicitly excluded from scope), not the newsletter signup bar that should be removed.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove the newsletter signup bar displaying 'Join our newsletter for energy insights and exclusive offers' from the landing page
missing_requirements.reason: No evidence in the diff showing removal of a newsletter signup bar. The CallToActionSection.tsx shows an email signup form with 'Get Started' CTA, which matches the main CTA functionality that should be preserved per constraints. The newsletter bar described in REQ-21 appears to be a separate component that is not addressed in the changes.
